entry.title: C#数组
entry.content: 数组的声明和创建 int[] a=new int[5]; int[] a;a=new int[5]; int[] a=new int[] {1,2,3}; int[] a;a=new int[] {1,2,3}; int[] a={1,2,3};

entry.title: c#字符串操作
entry.content: C#字符串操作常用代码123456789101112131415String s1=" a b cde ";String s2;String s3="";String s4=String.empty;int len=s1.length;s1=s2+s3;s2=len.ToString();s2=s1.trim();s2=s1.Indexof('a');s2=s1.Insert(0,"xx");s2=s1.remove(0,2)；s2=s1.Replace('a','b');String[] tmp=s1.Split(' ');s2=s1.Substring(0,4);s2=String.Format("name:{0},sex:{1}",2,3);
